textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 35in / 89cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Hand wash. 100% polyester. Fabric: Sateen. A polka-dot sateen dress with a relaxed silhouette. A pocket details the front, and buttons fasten the back. Side slits and short dolman sleeves. Unlined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer HATCH designer Ariane Goldman's first label, Twobirds, makes lovely, multi-functional bridesmaids' dresses that can be worn after the wedding. Now, Goldman brings that same versatility to HATCH maternity apparel, an effortlessly chic collection that begs to be worn before, during, and after pregnancy. With its sophisticated fabrics and modern silhouettes, HATCH is the deft continuation of Goldman's signature aesthetic, in which special-occasion clothing is easily brought into everyday rotation. See all HATCH reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
